description.japanese: 本編の全ての飲食店で食事をした
description.schinese: 尝遍正篇的所有餐饮店
description.spanish: Has comido en todos los restaurantes.
description.tchinese: 在本篇中所有餐飲店用餐過

description.french: Vous avez pris 10 photos.
description.japanese: 携帯電話で写真を10回撮った
description.spanish: Has sacado 10 fotografías.

description.brazilian: Bebeu todas as bebidas das máquinas de venda.
description.english: Drank all drink types from vending machines.
description.french: Vous avez bu tous les types de boisson aux distributeurs.
description.italian: Hai bevuto tutti i tipi di bevande dai distributori.
description.japanese: 自動販売機のドリンクを全種類飲んだ
description.koreana: 자동판매기에서 파는 모든 종류의 드링크를 마셨다
description.latam: Consumiste todos los tipos de bebidas de las máquinas expendedoras.
description.portuguese: Bebeu todas as bebidas das máquinas de venda.
description.russian: Вы попробовали все напитки из торговых автоматов.
description.schinese: 尝遍自动售货机中的所有饮料
description.spanish: Has probado todas las bebidas de las máquinas expendedoras.
description.tchinese: 喝過自動販賣機所有種類的飲料

description.french: Vous avez détruit un établissement trois fois.
description.japanese: 本編で店内を3回破壊した
description.russian: Вы разгромили одно и то же заведение три раза.
description.schinese: 在正篇中打砸过3次店铺
description.spanish: Has destruido un mismo establecimiento tres veces.

description.french: Vous avez possédé plus de 10 000 000 yens.
description.japanese: 所持金が1千万円を超えた
description.schinese: 持有金钱超过1千万日元
description.spanish: Has acumulado más de 10 000 000 de yenes.

description.brazilian: Derrotou todos os chefões da rua.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu tous les boss de rue.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto tutti i boss di strada.
description.japanese: 本編の全てのエンカウントボスを倒した
description.latam: Derrotaste a todos los jefes en la calle.
description.portuguese: Derrotou todos os chefões da rua.
description.schinese: 击败正篇中所有的随机遇敌战首领
description.spanish: Has derrotado a todos los jefes en la calle.
description.tchinese: 打倒本篇中所有徘徊頭目
